com.htsmart.wristband.scanner

接口 IDeviceScanner


  • public interface IDeviceScanner
    Bluetooth device scanner. Get instance like this: 
     IDeviceScanner scanner = WristbandApplication.getDeviceScanner();

    If your mobile support BLE4.0, isSupport() will return true. Each scan lasts about 10s, setScanPeriods(int) used for setting duration time.

    Use addScannerListener(ScannerListener, DeviceFilter) or addScannerListener(ScannerListener) to monitor scan result. And removeScannerListener(ScannerListener) to remove a listener.

    Use start() or start(ScannerListener) do scan operation.Each scan lasts about 10s. And you can Immediately stop scanning with stop() method. 

     public interface ScannerListener {

  //A device is found.(Callback in Android MainThread)
  void onScan(ScanDeviceWrapper wrapDevice);

  //Scan has stopped.(Callback in Android MainThread)
  void onStop();

 }

 public interface DeviceFilter {
  //device filter. If return true, the device will be post to ScannerListener#onScan(ScanDeviceWrapper) method.
  boolean accept(ScanDeviceWrapper var1);
 }

 public class ScanDeviceWrapper {
  private BluetoothDevice device;//bluetooth device
  private int rssi;//rssi value when the device be found
  private byte[] scanRecord;//scanRecord when the device be found
  ...
 }

    • 方法概要

      方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      void addScannerListener(ScannerListener listener)
      Add a scan listener.
      void addScannerListener(ScannerListener listener, DeviceFilter deviceFilter)
      Add a scan listener.
      boolean isScanning()
      Whether is in scanning state.
      boolean isSupport()
      Determine whether your phone supports BLE4.0.
      void removeScannerListener(ScannerListener listener)
      Remove a scanner listener
      void setScanPeriods(int scanPeriod)
      Setting each scan duration time.
      boolean start()
      Start scan.(Use in Android MainThread)
      boolean start(ScannerListener listener)
      Start scan with specified ScannerListener.(Use in Android MainThread)
      void stop()
      Stop scan.(Use in Android MainThread)

      If current is not in scanning, nothing happens.

    • 方法详细资料

      • setScanPeriods

        void setScanPeriods(int scanPeriod)
        Setting each scan duration time. It is a global setting, you only need setting once. If is already in scanning, will be affect on next time.
        参数:
        scanPeriod - Duration time, unit is millisecond

      • isScanning

        boolean isScanning()
        Whether is in scanning state.
        返回:
        True is scanning. False not.

      • start

        boolean start()
        Start scan.(Use in Android MainThread)
        返回:
        Whether to start scanning successfully. True for success, False not.

      • start

        boolean start(ScannerListener listener)
        Start scan with specified ScannerListener.(Use in Android MainThread)
        参数:
        listener - All the callback only for this listener at this scan event.
        返回:
        Whether to start scanning successfully. True for success, False not.

      • stop

        void stop()
        Stop scan.(Use in Android MainThread)

        If current is not in scanning, nothing happens. If stop scanning,ScannerListener#onStop() will be call.

      • addScannerListener

        void addScannerListener(ScannerListener listener,
                      DeviceFilter deviceFilter)
        Add a scan listener. You should removeScannerListener(ScannerListener) if your don't need it.
        参数:
        listener - listener
        deviceFilter - filter device

      • addScannerListener

        void addScannerListener(ScannerListener listener)
        Add a scan listener. You should removeScannerListener(ScannerListener) if your don't need it.
        参数:
        listener - Listener will be added.

      • removeScannerListener

        void removeScannerListener(ScannerListener listener)
        Remove a scanner listener
        参数:
        listener - Listener will be removed if has added.

      • isSupport

        boolean isSupport()
        Determine whether your phone supports BLE4.0. True for support, and false not. If return false, your should not use any other method in this class.
        返回:
        True for support, and false not.
